lead_paragraph: Lionsgate's TEXAS CHAINSAW MASSACRE 3D continues the legendary story of the homicidal Sawyer family, picking up where Tobe Hooper's 1974 horror classic left off in Newt, Texas, where for decades people went missing without a trace. The townspeople l
